channel.title: Code on Moriel's Mauni blog
channel.description: Recent content in Code on Moriel's Mauni blog

item.title: Hugo vs Flask
item.description:
Choices

At first, I wanted to make this blog with Python Flask. That the framework I know how to work with, not flawless but I know my way in it. I come from the world of System and DevOps and I don’t know any “Web building frameworks”.

Flask

I met Flask the first time a year ago, I was learning Python and part of the course was about web apps and I mage a demo blog just to get the experience. Blog with Flask repository
